org.openimaj.tools

Class FileToolsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.tools.FileToolsUtil

  • public class FileToolsUtil
extends Object
    Tools for dealing with #InOutTool instances that are local file
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • validateLocalInput

        public static List<File> validateLocalInput(InOutToolOptions tool)
                                     throws IOException
        Validate the (local) input from an InOutToolOptions and return the corresponding file.
        Parameters:
        tool - the tool from which to get settings
        Returns:
        a none null input file location if it exists
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file doesn't exist

      • isStdin

        public static boolean isStdin(InOutToolOptions tool)
        Test whether the input is the stdin
        Parameters:
        tool -
        Returns:
        true if input should be stdin, false otherwise.

      • isStdout

        public static boolean isStdout(InOutToolOptions tool)
        Test whether the requested output is stdout.
        Parameters:
        tool - the tool from which to get settings
        Returns:
        true if output the stdout; false otherwise.

      • validateLocalOutput

        public static File validateLocalOutput(InOutToolOptions tool)
                                throws IOException
        Validate the (local) ouput from an InOutToolOptions and return the corresponding file.
        Parameters:
        tool - the tool from which to get settings
        Returns:
        the output file location, deleted if it is allowed to be deleted
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file exists, but can't be deleted

      • validateLocalOutput

        public static File validateLocalOutput(String out,
                       boolean overwrite)
                                throws IOException
        Validate the (local) ouput from an String and return the corresponding file.
        Parameters:
        out - where the file will go
        overwrite - whether to overwrite existing files
        Returns:
        the output file location, deleted if it is allowed to be deleted
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file exists, but can't be deleted

      • validateLocalOutput

        public static File validateLocalOutput(String out,
                       boolean overwrite,
                       boolean contin)
                                throws IOException
        Validate the (local) ouput from an String and return the corresponding file.
        Parameters:
        out - where the file will go
        overwrite - whether to overwrite existing files
        contin - whether an existing output should be continued (i.e. ignored if it exists)
        Returns:
        the output file location, deleted if it is allowed to be deleted
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file exists, but can't be deleted
